annotation.spannedText: The more serious flaw lies in making anthropomorphic assessments of what we think viruses require, such as concluding that increased viral transmission is a desired trait

classMention.mentionClass: The more serious flaw lies in making anthropomorphic assessments of what we think viruses require, such as concluding that increased viral transmission is a desired trait

annotation.spannedText: Evolution does not move a virus along a trajectory aimed at perfection

classMention.mentionClass: Evolution does not move a virus along a trajectory aimed at perfection

annotation.spannedText: Change comes about by eliminating those viruses that are not well adapted for the current conditions, not by building a virus that will fare better tomorrow

classMention.mentionClass: Change comes about by eliminating those viruses that are not well adapted for the current conditions, not by building a virus that will fare better tomorrow

annotation.spannedText: All the viruses on Earth today transmit well enough, or they would not be here

classMention.mentionClass: All the viruses on Earth today transmit well enough, or they would not be here

annotation.spannedText: Our assumptions of what constitute the selective forces are usually tainted by anthropomorphism

classMention.mentionClass: Our assumptions of what constitute the selective forces are usually tainted by anthropomorphism

annotation.spannedText: more virulent Marek’s disease viruses replicate longer in vaccinated than unvaccinated chickens, and can be readily transmitted to other chickens

classMention.mentionClass: more virulent Marek’s disease viruses replicate longer in vaccinated than unvaccinated chickens, and can be readily transmitted to other chickens

annotation.spannedText: But these results do not prove that more virulent MDV arose because of permissive vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: But these results do not prove that more virulent MDV arose because of permissive vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Nor do the results prove in general that leaky vaccines lead to selection of more virulent viruses

classMention.mentionClass: Nor do the results prove in general that leaky vaccines lead to selection of more virulent viruses

annotation.spannedText: The results simply show that a vaccine that does not prevent replication will allow transmission of virulent viruses

classMention.mentionClass: The results simply show that a vaccine that does not prevent replication will allow transmission of virulent viruses

annotation.spannedText: I do not feel that these experimental results have general implications for the use of any animal vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: I do not feel that these experimental results have general implications for the use of any animal vaccine

annotation.spannedText: It is unfortunate that the work has been covered in many news sources with the incorrect implication that vaccines may be responsible for the emergence of more virulent viruses.

classMention.mentionClass: It is unfortunate that the work has been covered in many news sources with the incorrect implication that vaccines may be responsible for the emergence of more virulent viruses.
